alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Perkins; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 06 at 2:00AM MST until February 06 at 6:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The Rapid City area, the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills, the plains of Pennington County and Meade County, and Butte County, Harding County, and Perkins County. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Perkins; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
